metadata.title: CVE-2018-20070 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Incorrect handling of confusable characters in URL Formatter in GoogleChrome prior to 71.0.3578.80 allowed a remote attacker to spoof thecontents of the Omnibox (URL bar) via a crafted domain name.

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
